snippet: The FiveThirtyEight forecast says Mitt Romney’s chance of winning the election has improved since last week, but most other candidates have gotten larger bounces after naming their running mates.
abstract: The FiveThirtyEight forecast says Mitt Romney’s chance of winning the election has improved since last week, but most other candidates have gotten larger bounces after naming their running mates.

headline.main: Aug. 16: Why I'm Not Buying the Romney Rally
